section.title: Components of the NOF
section.description: How the framework is componentised, what those components are, hwo they are used, and when they need to be replaced
section.para: Components within the NOF can be exchanged so that the system can be tailored to work in specific ways. The main components in the NOF are:-

The configuratiin component provides the rest of the framework with a central place to access all the configuration properties. Each property is accessed by a fully qualified name, and can be accessed by type. The Configuration class is concrete and therefore can only be subclassed, but it be be created using a ConfigurationLoader, which loads the properties into the configuration. The provided ConfigurationLoader is ConfigurationPropertiesLoader, which loads the properties from a Java style properties file.
